data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I do think nowadays people consume more healthily than their elders.  First of all, people nowadays don’t suffer from famine or hunger a lot compared to their elders, so they may not have the craving for food that contains a lot of fat or sugar;  in this case, they’re also luckier.  On the other hand, nowadays with the development of science about healthy diets and the spread of social media, people get to know more about its benefits of it, thus they intend to choose more organic food and change their unhealthy diet. （96 words）
data.referenceText: Compare the eating habits of young people today to those of an older generation.
data.referenceTranslate: 比较一下现在年轻人的饮食习惯和老一辈的饮食习惯。
